hooks.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".tool_input.command // empty"); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE "^git commit|&& git commit|; git commit"; then if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE "\-m .*(feat|fix|docs|style|refactor|perf|test|build|ci|chore|revert)(\(|:|!)"; then exit 0; fi; echo "{\"decision\": \"block\", \"reason\": \"Use /commit instead of raw git commit\"}" >&2; exit 2; fi'
